text: thumb thumb Rhamphomyia is a genus of dance flies, in the fly family Empididae. Rhamphomyia longicauda is a species endogenous to eastern North America The species of Rhamphomyia are arranged into subgenera, as follows: ;Aclonempis Collin, 1926 :*Rhamphomyia albohirta Collin, 1926 :*Rhamphomyia andalusiaca Strobl, 1899 :*Rhamphomyia clypeata Macquart, 1834 :*Rhamphomyia eupterota Loew, 1873 :*Rhamphomyia galactoptera Strobl, 1893 :*Rhamphomyia gibbifera Strobl, 1906
